business_details.Business: Sentenced the accused Sukur Ali to undergo rigorous imprisonment for one year and to pay a fine of Rs.1000/- only, in default to undergo rigorous imprisonment for one month, for committing the offence under Sections 363 IPC and to undergo rigorous imprisonment for seven years and to pay a fine of Rs.10000/- only in default to undergo rigorous imprisonment for one year, for committing the offence under Section 4 of the POCSO Act.
